author: MaximoTrinidad
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

When clicking in the PowerShell Core OS "Instructions" link, then is talking back to the main page.  I can go straight to the "release" link to download PowerShell Core Beta 4 with no issues.

:)
![powernext_2017-07-13_19-59-12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/28192782-610d4068-6806-11e7-9595-170e1685f089.jpg)

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Not seeing your repro.  Clicking on those two links takes me to the instruction pages.

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Never mind!  It's something with mi Edge Browser cache not getting to the page.  I can access the link with another browser Chrome.

I'm closing the issue!

Thanks

title: PowerShell Core Beta 4 - Instruction page send back to landing page.
